thread.title: Diego Costa and Willian punish Chelsea teammate on coach home from Wolves - despite winning the game - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Diego Costa and Willian punish Chelsea teammate on coach home from Wolves - despite winning the game - Mirror Online

author: Jake Polden
title: Diego Costa and Willian punish Chelsea teammate on coach home from Wolves - despite winning the game - Mirror Online
text:
Get Chelsea FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Diego Costa is never too far away from mischief. 
And for one reason or another he loves slapping people with wooden spoons and sandals and probably anything else he can get his hands on. 
The latest victim of one of his pranks - which he enlisted the help of Chelsea teammate Willian to pull off - was 21-year-old Kenedy. 
As you can see in the above video, the young Brazilian, who was an unused substitute in the Blues' 2-0 win over Wolves in the FA Cup on Saturday, was sat next to his fellow countrymen on the coach home. Diego Costa hands out the punishment Willian gets in on the act 
And, well, that did the youngster absolutely no favours. 
After presumably losing some game - we'd like to think this is the case, anyway - he holds his hand out and is slapped by Costa. 
He is then slapped by Willian, who laughs his head off. Kenedy was an unused substitute in Chelsea's FA Cup win (Photo: AFP/Getty) 
Although, to be fair, the 21-year-old, who was on-loan at Watford at the start of the season, appears to be enjoying himself just as much as the two pranksters. 
All this took place after Chelsea booked a spot in the quarter-finals of the Cup. 
Can you imagine if they'd lost! Like us on Facebook
